biotools.summary: SEQATOMS is a web tool for identifying missing regions in PDB sequence. To visualize these regions in their sequence context, a BLAST interface is used that is able to show the lower-case masked regions in the output (hits in the BLAST output are replaced with the corresponding subsequence from the original FASTA files).
